phrases: Everyone, brace yourselves and listen well!
I have an extremely important announcement to make.
From the day after we return to the guild from Tenroujima...
I am going to introduce a women's only dress code!
You got to choose between a nurse outfit or a school swimsuit!
I are not heard about this!
You are supposed to be mad about this!
This is no time for jokes.
The Zeref... is standing before my eyes...
Maybe I am not one to talk,
but how many lives did you take in order to get these keys?
Those keys were nothing more than illusions.
Just one of the stories made by a sect of the believers in the Black Wizard Zeref...
Were you fooled by that dusty old fairy tale?
I was never asleep in the first place.
The man you see before you is the Black Wizard Zeref.
I used my eye and saw you!
I saw you, not even able to defeat one of my servants!
Then I can skip to the chase.
That was what I was capable of...
You see, 400 years ago I saw countless wars of man...
But, after a certain day, I learned the value of life.
Ever since then, the more I feel the value of life,
the more my accursed body steals people's souls.
In order not to steal people's souls, I cannot forget the weight of a human life.
You are saying you were fighting while valuing life?
And because of that, I cannot use my magic anywhere close to how I would wish to...
But that all changes if I forget about the value of life.
You were the people who pulled the trigger.
Acnologia will herald the end of an era.
Your evil deeds have summoned it.
What in the world are you talking about?
I still have things I want to ask!
Your first sin is summoning Acnologia!
You do not seem very cheerful...
It might be difficult right now...
Forget about Grimoire Heart, and Zeref...
Is it true you were the one who destroyed my town, Ultear?
I was going to tell you everything, one day...
I thought that I was on just the first lap of my life.
Then, when I went to the World of Great Magic
and perfected the Time Ark, I would start the second lap.
I believed that I would redo everything that happened in the first lap...
That is why I was able to do such horrible things, and stray so far from the path of humanity...
The second lap would be my true life!
The two of us would be happy...
It was all just what I planned.
To other people, I am a devil.
Piling sins on top of sins, I am a fool of a woman with delusions of a happy life...
I am not... going to ask you to forgive me.
But, let me tell you that I am sorry.
You must hate me enough to kill me.
Because, I will disappear from this world...
I am sure you will be happy...
A fitting place to meet my end.
I know all the sadness and pain you feel, Ultear!
You are the one who raised me, Ultear.
That is not going to change!
So never say anything like that again, understand?!
Please, do not leave me alone!
Fall to the pits of hell.
The S Class Wizard Advancement Exam is on hold!
Make me S Class, damn it!
You are not even a candidate!
A member of the Magic Council infiltrated the candidates,
I guess we have no choice.
You are really okay with this, damn it?!
And you should not be so worked up about it.
I so wanted to be S Class!
You will make it next time for sure, Gray-sama!
A Man has to know when to call it quits...
Well, I are not givin' up!
I am going to be S Class, no matter what!
Gray, Elfman, and Levy all gave up, right?
Then I will become S Class!
I am going to be S Class!
Let us start the final test right now, special!
Beat me, and I will make you S Class, Natsu.
Well, I was wonderin' whether you were the real deal.
Do not bully her too much, I will feel sorry for her.
I told you I am the real Lisanna!
I am kind of scared just to say hi, Carla.
I am sure you have heard a bunch of stories, but he is not a bad guy deep down.
He is just a little awkward at times.
I am going to introduce myself!
It definitely works itself into these wounds...
Cana, is your right arm okay?
The right arm I borrowed Fairy Glitter with?
When I left you behind and went to Mavis's grave... I...
I am not upset about it!
I will regret how I betrayed my friend for the rest of my life...
You did not really betray me or anything.
Just a little prank like that happens all the time in the guild, right?
If you keep thinking about it the way you are,
it is going to be hard on me, too.
I think I am going to try telling my father the truth,
even though I did not become an S Class wizard.
What is with the bored look?
Because this is a total snore-fest.
Fishing is a man's romantic adventure.
I never said you could eat them!
The feeling of being one with nature!
A serious battle of eat or be eaten!
This, indeed, is a man's playground!
Natsu is finally awakening his manly spirit of romantic adventure!
Cana said she is got something important to talk about!
The reason I came to the guild was... to search for my father, you know?
Actually, that is the first I have heard of it.
So then, you are saying your dad was in Fairy Tail?
A lot happened, and I was never able to tell you.
I know it is a lot to just accept...
Emma, Lyra, Jean, Sydney, Kate, Yuko, Francoise...
How many flings have you had?!
You are the spitting image of Sylvia!
Like, you are the same sex!
God, you are making me angry!
I cannot believe that such a philandering loser is my old man!
That is all I wanted to say.
I am not saying we should be family or anything, got it?
I am fine with things staying the way they are...
Why did you keep quiet all this time?
I could not bring myself to tell you.
Cornelia is the only woman I ever loved.
She is the only one I married.
She left me after getting frustrated from me always being away on jobs, 18 years ago.
I heard that she had passed away.
But to think she left a child...
I am sorry, I did not realize it was you.
I purposefully hid it from you.
I finally feel a weight has been lifted off my chest.
I had a daughter this close to me...
I am not saying you should take responsibility for me or anything.
Let us just stay as we are.
But, let me say this, just once...
I am glad I got to meet you, Father.
I will never let you feel lonely again!
From now on, when I go on a job... or out drinking...
It will be together with you, always!
That could get a little annoying.
Please give me the right to love you!
When I get back, maybe I will go see him again.
We all stood there under the warm sun.
Natsu, I have got something I would like to talk with you about...
I guess asking Natsu is not going to help...
No, there is always the slight chance a miracle could happen!
What are you muttering to yourself about?
YOU-Um, I... If I am going to hold Carla's ha...
If you are a man, just give it a shot, make it or break it!
Yeah, I do not want anything broken is why I am asking...
Well, then you have got the wrong guy.
